data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong easterly airstream will continue to affect the coast of Guangdong today and tomorrow. A broad band of clouds will bring a few rain patches to the region. A dry northeast monsoon is expected to affect southern China gradually tomorrow. It will become appreciably cooler over the region in the following couple of days, and cold in the morning and at night over inland areas. The weather will improve progressively. With the monsoon moderating gradually in the middle and latter parts of next week, temperatures will rise over Guangdong.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260130","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy with one or two rain patches.","forecastMaxtemp":{"value":19,"unit":"C"},"forecastMintemp":{"value":17,"unit":"C"},"forecastMaxrh":{"value":95,"unit":"percent"},"forecastMinrh":{"value":70,"unit":"percent"},"ForecastIcon":62,"PSR":"Low"},{"forecastDate":"20260131","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4, becoming north force 4 to 5 later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches and relatively low visibility in some areas at first. Bright periods in the afternoon.
